page.title: 20EMPLOYMENT
page.content: MOST FAMILIES HAVE JOBS OUTSIDE THIS 12 KM. SQUARE ALTHOUGH MANY FARMS ARE OWNER OCCUPIED. SOME FARM WORKERS LIVE IN THE AREA. THERE IS QUITE A LARGE NUMBER OF RETIRED PEOPLE ESPECIALLY IN GAYHURST.TO A CERTAIN EXTENT THE THREE COMMUNITIES ARE DIVIDED BETWEEN THE NEW PEOPLE AND THE ESTABLISHED FAMILIES AND IN THE CASE OF THE FORMER EMPLOYMENT IS ENTIRELY OUTSIDE THE AREA IN MILTON KEYNES,LUTON AND IN A FEW CASES LONDON. MANY WORK IN HI TECH FIRMS ASSOCIATED WITH ELECTRONICS AND COMPUTERS.HOUSE PRICES ARE CONSIDERED HIGH AS ARE THE LOCAL AUTHORITY RATES AND THERE IS A GREAT DEAL OF RESENTMENT BASED UPON THE BELIEF RATES ARE SO HIGH TO PAY FOR THE NEW CITY OF MILTON KEYNES FROM WHICH THE 3 VILLAGES RECEIVE NO BENEFIT.THE PROBLEM OF UNEMPLOYMENT IS A NATIONAL ONE WHICH HAS LITTLE REAL MEANING IN THIS COMMUNITY.
